question: Which city held the Olympic game in the year represented by the bigger number of 1996 and 2004?
Which U.S. historical event occurred in the year obtained by multiplying 48 and 37?
Which country hosted the FIFA World Cup in the year obtained by dividing 6054 by 3?
Which renowned physicist was born in the year resulting from subtracting 21 from 1900?
Which city hosted the Summer Olympics in the year obtained by subtracting 4 from the larger number between 2008 and 2012?
